ComicInfo.Summary: Ellen Blair. Syd Miller. Two of Earth’s foremost combat exorcists. And despite all that? They’re in way over their heads. Syd and Ellen might’ve defeated Sloth and exorcized the first level of the Hellscraper, but there are still legions of demons between the two warriors and the soul auction they’re desperate to shut down…not to mention the devastating sins that guard each level. As Syd and Ellen celebrate their victory over Sloth, they don’t even realize they’ve fallen right into the clutches of Lust! As a couple, Syd and Ellen could never make it work, but now, as partners, if they can’t overcome the lingering lust they have for each other, their mission to save souls will be deader than their romance.
